languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь сорваться с места — и спотыкаетесь о собственные ноги. Конюх ухватывает вас за волосы, перед глазами плывут радужные круги.{/n}
{n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs you by the hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь сорваться с места — и спотыкаетесь о собственные ноги. Конюх ухватывает вас за волосы, перед глазами плывут радужные круги.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs your hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}
{n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs your hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}
{n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs you by the hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}

{n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs you by the hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}
{n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs you by the hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试图逃跑，却被自己的腿绊倒了。马夫扯着你的头发，你眼前浮现出了无数明晃晃的光圈。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs you by the hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试图逃跑，却被自己的腿绊倒了。马夫扯着你的头发，你眼前浮现出了无数明晃晃的光圈。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas darte a la fuga, pero tropiezas con tus propias piernas. El mozo de cuadra te agarra del pelo. Tu vista se llena de puntitos luminosos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs you by the hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas darte a la fuga, pero tropiezas con tus propias piernas. El mozo de cuadra te agarra del pelo. Tu vista se llena de puntitos luminosos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Koşmaya çalışsan da kendi bacaklarına takılıyorsun. Seyis seni saçından yakalıyor. Gözlerin parlak halkalarla doluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs you by the hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Koşmaya çalışsan da kendi bacaklarına takılıyorsun. Seyis seni saçından yakalıyor. Gözlerin parlak halkalarla doluyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは急いで逃げようとするが、自分の足につまずいて転ぶ。馬飼いは髪を掴んであなたを捕まえる。眩しい円があなたの視界を満たす。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs you by the hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは急いで逃げようとするが、自分の足につまずいて転ぶ。馬飼いは髪を掴んであなたを捕まえる。眩しい円があなたの視界を満たす。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous essayez de vous enfuir, mais vous vous emmêlez les jambes. Le palefrenier vous agrippe les cheveux. Votre vision s'emplit de cercles lumineux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs you by the hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous essayez de vous enfuir, mais vous vous emmêlez les jambes. Le palefrenier vous agrippe les cheveux. Votre vision s'emplit de cercles lumineux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du unternimmst einen Fluchtversuch, stolperst aber über deine eigenen Beine. Der Stallbursche packt dich an den Haaren. Helle Lichtpunkte erscheinen vor deinen Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to make a run for it, but trip over your own legs. The stable hand grabs you by the hair. Bright circles fill your vision.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du unternimmst einen Fluchtversuch, stolperst aber über deine eigenen Beine. Der Stallbursche packt dich an den Haaren. Helle Lichtpunkte erscheinen vor deinen Augen.{/n}
